items.title: The Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW) Delivers 10x Total Return Since Launch of S&P Dividend Aristocrats Index
items.description: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) is included among the 11 Best Dividend Aristocrat Stocks to Invest in Now. Among the founding members of the S&P Dividend Aristocrats Index, The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) has stood out as the strongest performer. The stock recorded the highest return between May 2, 2005, and May 2025, delivering a gain of [â€¦]
